name: sequence-explorer
description: Wrapper on top of and bundled with sankeyseq which is a Sankey plugin for sequential data

scripts.old_pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/sequence-explorer.v20.js -- index.js
scripts.old_postpublish: zip -j build/sequence-explorer.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/sequence-explorer.v20.js build/sequence-explorer.v20.min.js
scripts.test: node test/sankeySeqExplorer-test.js | tap-spec && eslint index.js src
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/sequence-explorer.js -c -m -o build/sequence-explorer.min.js
